verses.verse: Nataka nimjue Yesu, na nizidi kumfahamu Nijue pendo lake tu, wokovu wake kamili.
Natake nione Yesu, na nizidi kusikia Anenapo kitabuni, kujidhihirisha kwangu.
Nataka tena zaidi, daima kupambanua Mapenzi yake, nifanye yale yanayompendeza.
Nataka nikae naye, kwa mazungumzo matamu Nizidi kuwaonyesha, wengine wokovu wake.
